title: Maker-Based Artificial Intelligence Project Learning: Development of a Smart Recycling System

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming comprehension, experience in scientific experiment design, and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: A science-integrated job competency enhancement program for office/administrative professionals. Conducted in environments equipped with digital devices (Raspberry Pi, sensor kits, etc.)

learning_goals: Students can design an AI-based recycling classification model and integrate it into actual hardware within three weeks.
Learners can iteratively improve final deliverables by exchanging feedback at each project stage using collaboration tools.
Participants can document AI-driven problem-solving processes post-project and present outcomes at a performance showcase.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
